values: 怀疑（某人有罪）；猜想；推测；不信任；觉得（尤指坏事可能属实或发生）；认为可能
犯罪嫌疑人；嫌疑犯；疑犯；嫌疑分子；可疑对象；可疑人物；被怀疑者
可疑的；令人怀疑的；不可信的；不可靠的；靠不住的；引起猜疑的；值得怀疑的

adj. 易受影响的；易受伤害的；可能有…的；容许…的；敏感的；易动感情的

n. 怀疑；一丝；审慎的怀疑
adj. 可疑的；表示怀疑的；怀疑的；引起怀疑的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 前缀sub- 在c, p, t 前的变形, 指"在…下面"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 怀疑（suspect的过去分词和过去式）
暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，多指因证据不足或仅凭证据还不能肯定而产生怀疑，多含否定意味。
指猜疑、疑心，肯定意味较多。

word_group.brief_definition: 主要嫌疑犯；主要嫌犯；主要嫌疑人
顶级的间谍嫌疑犯；最好的间谍嫌疑犯

bilingual.source: The police suspect him of the crime.

bilingual.target: 你怀疑特别的某个人吗？

bilingual.source: I suspect she is not telling the truth.
I suspect that the project will be delayed.
They suspect the food might be contaminated.
bilingual.target: 他们怀疑食物可能被污染了。

bilingual.source: The police suspect someone poisoned the food.
bilingual.target: 警方怀疑有人在食物中下毒。

bilingual.source: Rest in a cool place if you suspect heatstroke.
bilingual.target: 如果怀疑中暑，请在凉爽的地方休息。

bilingual.source: They suspect that seafood caused the food poisoning.
bilingual.target: 他们怀疑是海鲜引起了食物中毒。

bilingual.source: They suspect there is a black hand manipulating everything.
bilingual.target: 他们怀疑有黑手在操纵这一切。

bilingual.source: Her actions make people suspect she has an ulterior motive.
bilingual.target: 她的行为让人怀疑她有不可告人的动机。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you still suspect him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还怀疑他吗？

yingyinNormal.en: As it was first class, I suspect Ritz.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为是一等座，我怀疑是乐之饼干。

yingyinNormal.en: We've no reason to suspect Edmunds's data would have soured.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没有理由怀疑Edmund的数据不好。

yingyinNormal.en: Next to him, who would suspect poor, stuttering Professor Quirrell?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以呢，有他在身边有他在，谁还会怀疑可怜的奇洛教授？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, believe me, no one would suspect your manners to be rehearsed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，相信我，没人会怀疑那是你排练好了的举动。

yingyinNormal.en: I keep those relationships private so no one will suspect any bias toward me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没有声张那些关系以保证没人会怀疑法官对我有偏袒。

yingyinNormal.en: I suspect that's a trap. No, it isn't. I think she's knows that she's being unreasonable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我怀疑这是个陷阱。不是的，我认为她知道自己这样太不讲理了。

yingyinNormal.en: You suspect the Latin's father? Did he abandon his son to serve his purse or his Pope?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怀疑那拉丁人的父亲？他抛弃儿子是为了一己私利，还是教皇之意？

yingyinNormal.en: He was brilliant, but as we became close, he began to suspect that I wasn't telling him everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他很聪明，但随着我们越来越亲近，他开始怀疑我对他有所隐瞒。

yingyinNormal.en: My sister hardly shows her true feelings to me. I suppose you suspect his fortune had some bearing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我姐姐几乎都不向我表露她真实的感觉。我怀疑是因为他富有的关系？

yingyinNormal.en: I suspect not for long. Meet the competition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我不再是了，来看看竞争对手。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on, Kalinda. What about the earlier suspect, the professor?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，凯琳达，之前的那位嫌疑人教授怎么样了？

yingyinNormal.en: Will, can I ask you something? I suspect you're going to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威尔，我能问你点事吗？你就知道你会问。

yingyinNormal.en: I suspect she's quite a tough nut. And I'm quite a tough nutcracker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看她应该不好对付。我也不是好打发的。

yingyinNormal.en: We've lost visual contact with the suspect. Okay, now I've really have to go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嫌犯已失去踪迹。好，我现在非走不可了。

yingyinNormal.en: Suspect has just emerged naked from the sewer. All right, you go. Bye-bye. Okay, bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嫌犯刚从水沟中裸体现身。好吧，你去就好，再见。好，再见。

yingyinNormal.en: Narrow the suspect pool. Look for ones who seem quiet or withdrawn, who seem nervous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 缩小嫌疑人范围，留意那些不动声响或孤僻的家伙和面露不安的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Chase Patterson, 25, his family slain in 2008. Chase was a prime suspect at the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 切斯·帕特森，25岁，全家在2008年被杀害，切斯是当时的主要嫌疑人。

yingyinNormal.en: I myself, suspect a more prosaic motive. Attempted burglary, or something of that ilk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我觉得你们没有这么高尚，你们只能干偷鸡摸狗的勾当。

yingyinNormal.en: I can scramble eggs, that's about it. I suspect Carson had plans for this, but too bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会炒蛋，但仅此而已了。卡森大概打算喝呢，可惜他享用不到了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可能的；有犯罪嫌疑的
n. 易受感染性；易受影响的气质；易被伤害；磁化率；电极化率；感情（多指敏感之处）
adj. 易受影响的；易受伤害的；可能有…的；容许…的；敏感的；易动感情的

word_family.mean: v. 疑有；察觉；推测；猜想；怀疑；不信任；怀疑…犯罪

examination_example.sentence: Authorities may search through the possessions of <highlight>suspects</highlight> at the time of their arrest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当局可能会在嫌疑人被捕时搜查他们的财产。

examination_example.sentence: Prohibit <highlight>suspects</highlight> from using their mobile phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止嫌疑人使用他们的手机。

examination_example.sentence: Search for <highlight>suspects</highlight>' mobile phones without a warrant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在没有搜查令的情况下搜查嫌疑人的手机。

examination_example.sentence: Eric <highlight>suspects</highlight> that the students' change in behavior is a result of multiple factors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃里克怀疑学生行为的改变是多种因素共同作用的结果。

examination_example.sentence: Eric <highlight>suspects</highlight> the greatest impact came from social influence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃里克怀疑最大的影响来自社会影响。

examination_example.sentence: But Dr Simonsohn <highlight>suspected</highlight> the truth was otherwise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但Simonsohn博士怀疑事实并非如此。

sense_info_list.en: have an idea that something is probably true or likely to happen, especially something bad, but without having definite proof

examination_example.sentence: Ambady <highlight>suspected</highlight> that deliberation focused them on vivid but misleading cues rather than letting the complex interplay of subtle signals form a holistic impression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ambady觉得，深思熟虑让他们把注意力集中在生动但具有误导性的线索上，而不是让微妙的信号进行复杂的相互作用来形成整体印象。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 前缀sub- 在c, p, t 前的变形, 指"在…下面"

word_usage.usage:
suspect是及物动词，接名词、代词、that从句、wh-从句作宾语，可用与被动结构；其后常接介词of引出怀疑、推测的内容。例：
They suspected him of betraying state secrets. 
他们怀疑他泄露了国家机密。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指怀疑某人有罪或某事很糟，尽管证据不足，甚至是毫无证据。
往往指“缺乏必要证据”，而怀疑某人某事的真实性。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 可疑的; 有嫌疑的; 嫌疑人; 可疑对象
疑有; 觉得(尤指坏事可能属实/发生)

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>suspect</highlight> that some experts in the fled will be keen to address alternative explanations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我怀疑有些想逃避的专家会热衷于给出另一种解释。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 易受影响的；易受伤害的；可能有…的；容许…的；敏感的；易动感情的

word_family.mean: v. 疑有；察觉；推测；猜想；怀疑；不信任；怀疑…犯罪

sense_info_list.en: have an idea that someone is guilty of something; without having definite proof
sense_info_list.zh: 怀疑; 可疑的; 有嫌疑的; 嫌疑人

examination_example.sentence: Identify the <highlight>suspect</highlight> on the security video.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在监控录像上指认嫌疑人。

examination_example.sentence: Kirsteen has now posted an image of a man <highlight>suspected</highlight> of stealing the dog.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 克里斯汀公布了一张涉嫌偷狗的男子的照片。

sense_info_list.en: have an idea that something is probably true or likely to happen; especially something bad; but without having definite proof
sense_info_list.zh: 疑有; 觉得(尤指坏事可能属实/发生)

examination_example.sentence: What did the author <highlight>suspect</highlight> back in 2016?
I <highlight>suspect</highlight> out of the 100 people, there were probably a bunch of them having a bad day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我怀疑在这100个人中，可能有很多人今天过得不好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He pulls out a special device, points it at the <highlight>suspect</highlight>, and switches it on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他拿出一个特殊的装置，对准嫌疑人，打开开关。

examination_example.sentence: It keeps the <highlight>suspect</highlight> from hurting others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它能防止嫌疑人伤害他人。

examination_example.sentence: It makes it easy to identify a <highlight>suspect</highlight>.
On his way to Bukhara he gets a taste of police methods when <highlight>suspected</highlight> of drug dealing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在去布哈拉的路上，当他被怀疑贩毒时，他体验到了警察的手段。

sense_info_list.zh: 不可靠的; 不诚实的; 可疑的

n. 生活资料；食物；营养；生计；支撑物；维持物

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 前缀sub- 在c, p, t 前的变形, 指"在…下面"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "The <highlight>suspect</highlight> is of medium height and young. He has long straight brown hair and big eye," an old woman says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “嫌疑人中等身材，很年轻。他有长长的棕色直发和大眼睛，”一位老妇人说。

examination_example.sentence: As a police artist, Joe Brown draws pictures of <highlight>suspects</highlight> (嫌疑犯) when people tell him about the appearance of each suspect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名警方画像专家，当人们告诉乔·布朗每个嫌疑犯的外貌时，他就会画出嫌疑犯的画像。

examination_example.sentence: Then, the police put the pictures in newspapers and on television to help find the <highlight>suspects</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，警察把照片刊登在报纸和电视上，以帮助找到嫌疑人。
